data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Free kick Angers.
Brestois needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Angers to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
In Brest Brestois attack through Paul Lasne. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
Brestois have a goal kick.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Romain Perraud (Brestois) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Florent Batta signals a Brestois throw-in in Angers's half.
Throw-in Brestois.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Brest.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Irvin Cardona of Brestois gets in a strike, but is off target.
Florent Batta awards Angers a goal kick.
Angers are coming forward and Stephane Bahoken gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Florent Batta awards Brestois a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Brestois capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Angers's half?
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Throw-in for Brestois close to the penalty box.
Florent Batta signals a throw-in for Brestois, close to Angers's area.
Angers have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Angers.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Florent Batta blows against Angers's Sada Thioub for offside.
Samuel Grandsir of Brestois smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Angers.
Can Brestois capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Angers's half?
Brestois are in shooting range from this free kick.
Florent Batta signals a throw-in for Brestois, close to Angers's area.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Brestois pushes forward through Cristian Battocchio, whose finish on goal is saved.
Brestois surge into the attack at Stade Francis-Le Ble but Irvin Cardona’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Angers.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Brestois in the half of Angers.
Angers are pushing forward but Pierrick Capelle's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stephane Bahoken puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Souleyman Doumbia.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
At Stade Francis-Le Ble the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Brestois's Cristian Battocchio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Angers have a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Brestois's Irvin Cardona misses with an attempt on goal.
Florent Batta awards Angers a goal kick.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Angers.
Angelo Fulgini gets his shot on target but fails to score for Angers.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.

Brestois to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Angers will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Brestois.
Gaetan Belaud (Brestois) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Throw-in high up the field for Brestois in Brest.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.

Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?

Angers make their first substitution with Mathias Pereira Lage replacing Antonin Bobichon.
Florent Batta signals a Brestois throw-in in Angers's half.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Angers.
Mathias Autret is replacing Cristian Battocchio for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Florent Batta signals a Brestois throw-in in Angers's half.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rachid Alioui is replacing Stephane Bahoken for the away team.
[62] ([63]) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
Brestois's Mathias Autret is on target but unsuccessful.
Brestois advance rapidly upfield but Florent Batta blows for offside.
Oliver Dall'Oglio (Brestois) is making a third substitution, with Yoann Court replacing Samuel Grandsir.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Brest to check on [36], who is grimacing with pain.
[36] has recovered and rejoins the match in [27].
Brestois drive upfield and Alexandre Mendy gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Angers defender.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
In Brest Brestois drive forward through Alexandre Mendy. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Angers needs to be cautious. Brestois have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Brestois in Brest.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Haris Belkebla is booked for the home team.
Rachid Alioui is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Angers’s Rachid Alioui is on his feet again at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Brestois's Gaetan Charbonnier gets in a shot on goal at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The away team replace Sada Thioub with Mateo Pavlovic.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Brestois have a dangerous throw-in.

[49] for [50] gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Angers have a goal kick.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Yoann Court (Brestois) has received a first yellow card.
[10] ([11]) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
